text: @bgluckman I think lenience is allowed in places where COVID-19 isn’t hard-hit. Here where I live, there’s only 2 confirmed cases of COVID-19, and they’re both in the hospital, and I’ve never been to the hospital since the pandemic started. I’m pretty sure I’m safe.
